item.title: Typing Speed Matters for Software Developers
item.description: Typing efficiency and speed is an often underrated and underappreciated skill for new and novice developers. I teach a coding bootcamp. I see adults of all ages, talents, backgrounds and walks of life start their journey into software development. One issue, of many, I have with coding bootcamps is that they say there are no prerequisits when there definitely are. I’ve seen students start bootcamp with a brand-new laptop, likely their first, log onto the Zoom class all bright eyed with ethusiam and wonder.
